smg.text: Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Haze in the morning. Force 2 to 3 east to northeasterly winds.
Humid. Mainly cloudy. Mist and fog. A few light rain patches. Light winds.
Temperature falling. Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Mist and fog at first. A few light rain patches. Light winds, becoming force 3 to 5 northerly winds with gusts.
Cold and dry. Fine apart from cloudy periods. Force 4 to 5 north to northeasterly winds with gusts.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 4 to 5 east to northeasterly winds with gusts.
Mainly cloudy. Force 3 to 4 easterly winds, occasionally force 5.
Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Light winds, becoming force 3 to 4 north to northeasterly winds.
